label: 抄经
cmd: #to qf-sms||#do report wrong||#do ask sengren about job||#to ts-sjy||#do write jing||#afterbusy||#delay 2000||#to qf-sms||#do ask sengren about done||#captcha 工号||#delay 1000||#loop

label: 做药
cmd: #prepare||#to yzyp||ask ping yizhi about 工作||n||peiyao||#afterbusy||#delay 5000||s||give cheng yao to ping yizhi||#loop

label: 练功
desc: 练功队列，将需要练功的指令设为aliasliangong
